keyNameOfFish.tooltip: Use this text box to specify the name of the fish.

keyCommand.tooltip: By default, Fish runs the 'fortune' command when you click on the applet. Use this text box to specify an alternative command to run.

keyFrames.tooltip: Use this spin box to specify the number of frames in the animation.

keyPausePerFrameInSeconds.tooltip: Use this spin box to specify the pause in seconds between each frame in the animation.

keyRotate.tooltip: Select this option to rotate the applet image when you add the applet to a vertical panel.

keyImagePath.tooltip: Use this field to select the image to display in the applet. You can select an image that is supplied with the applet or a personal image.

keyInstructionsText.description: For instructions on how to use and configure this applet, please visit the applet's page on the Cinnamon Spices website.

keyReportIssueText.description: If you encounter a problem with this applet, please file an issue report on GitHub. Note that a GitHub account is required to submit an issue. Before doing so, check if the issue has already been submitted by someone else. Since this applet is part of Linux Mint's `cinnamon-spices-applets` repository, it's important to follow their guidelines for this process. Make sure that the applet name (fish@kriegcc) is included in the title when opening a new issue. Follow the provided template for the description and provide as much information as possible about the issue.

keyButtonReportIssueInstructions.description: Reporting Bugs Instructions of Cinnamon Spices applets
keyButtonReportIssueInstructions.tooltip: Opens the contributions guidelines of the Cinnamon Spices applets repository on Github.

keyAboutText.description: The Fish applet displays a small fish, called Wanda, in the panel. Wanda does nothing useful. The applet has really no use what-so-ever. It only takes up disk space and compilation time, and if loaded it also takes up precious panel space and memory. Anybody found using it should be promptly sent for a psychiatric evaluation.

keyButtonWebsite.description: Fish Applet at Cinnamon Spices Website
keyButtonWebsite.tooltip: Opens the applet's page on Cinnamon Spices website.

keyCreditsText.description:
This project is an adaption of the Fish applet from GNOME and MATE desktops for Cinnamon desktop.
The original Fish applet is licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL).
